post.author: 이진경
post.content:
Advertisement number: 253149
Title: Programmer analyst (NOC: 2174)  
Terms of Employment: Permanent, Full Time, Day
Salary: $40,000.00 to $45,000.00 Yearly for 40 hours per week, Other Benefits
Anticipated Start Date: As soon as possible  
Location: Toronto North, Ontario (1 vacancy)
Skill Requirements:  
  Education: Completion of high school, Some university
Credentials (certificates, licences, memberships, courses, etc.): Information Systems Professional (ISP)
Experience: 3 - 5 years
Languages: Speak English, Read English, Write English
Work Setting Experience: Industry
Hardware Environment: IBM AS-400 minicomputers
Programming Languages: RPG
Generic Skills: Computer use (ex., use software packages; knowledge of hardware; work with computer-operated machinery), Planning and organizing skills (ex., manage priorities; order tasks efficiently), Problem-solving skills (ex., identify problem causes; determine steps to resolve; assess solution), Speaking and listening skills (ex., communicate clearly and effectively; follow directions; mediate disputes)
Other Information: Must be able to work on own at times,must have excellent oral and written skills to interact with users.

Employer: Barry Robertson & Associates (Placement Agency)

How to Apply:  By Mail:  

130 george Henry Blvd., suite 219
Toronto, Ontario
M2J 1G3


By Phone between 9:00 and 17:00:  

(416) 496-1505

By Fax: (416) 499-7180
By E-mail: barryvw@attcanada.ca

Business Profile: Finding employees for employers and finding jobs for candidates
Advertised until: 2003/03/13
post.title: Programmer analyst
